formalText: She has a track meet coming up also that she is training for she is a runner.
She is eating. She tells her mom what she eats just because she is not fat like she is.
She is busy and not concerned about happiness.
She needs to train and she is tired of everyone asking her; about what she eats and how much she exercises and the smartest in her class and one of the best Runners on the team.
She doesn't have time for all this.
She is only here to keep her mom off her back.
She will work with all of them.
She does want to be better.
